item.title: Domestic waste and overflowing bins all over the pavement, 31st August
item.description:
This property at 76/78 Camberwell Road is owned and run by Southwark Council. Thete are not enough bins so residents leave their waste in bin bags..but dont take the bins into the property..its piling up all over the street and has been for weeks. Photo will not upload.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bethwin Road, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of rubbish and building material on road & pavement, 31st August
item.description:
There is alot of discarded builders waste and other general waste dumped on the road and pavement. It's attracting other rubbish to be dumped there too. There is no skip there so they seem to be dumping stuff in the road instead. Its also encroaching onto the pavement. Been there for a few weeks now and getting worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 76, Henslowe Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very loud party, 31st August
item.description:
Very loud party with speakers connected to mains. Multiple large BBQs, 2 generators with bouncy castles. The noise is the main problem here. This has happened a lot in the past & needs to stop. Very disturbing for neighbours.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Milton Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
